scripts.build: npm run build:deps && npm run build:rs
scripts.build:deps: npm run build:css && npm run build:jsts && npm run minify
scripts.format: npm run format:rs && npm run format:ts && npm run minify:css
scripts.minify: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css
scripts.minify:js: npx terser src/assets/js/prefetch.js > ./target/generated/js/prefetch.min.js && npx terser src/assets/js/login.js > ./target/generated/js/login.min.js && npx terser src/assets/js/site.js > ./target/generated/js/site.min.js
